About Me

Here are a few things about me:

BIO

I am currently a 4th year Biomedical Engineering student at Ryerson University and I have a passion for medical technology innovations. My academic interests helps me fullfil my passion by helping improve the healthcare industry and apply engineering to improve treatment quality.
I created this website to be a platform for future employers to view and assist skills I have developed through my previous experiences.
My academic education at Ryerson University has given me the opportunity to apply and expand my knowledge through implementing various projects. If you wish, you can take a look at these projects by selecting MY WORK from the menu bar.

Biomedical Zone: Co-Development Lab

Back End Developer

    • Developed a PHP application for SMH using Laravel platform,
    the templating engine Blade, Controllers, and Routes.
    • Created DB schemas and migrations using Eloquent.
    • Created connections between PHP and MySQL.
    • Implemented form Validation and user authentication.
    • Contributed to Docker implementation and deployment

Biomedical Zone: Co-Development Lab

Front End Developer

    • Contributed to the development of a web-based application and mobile version for SMH Fraction Clinic.
    • Designed an interactive UI using HTML/CSS, JQuery, Bootstrap, JavaScript.
    • Implemented audio functionality throughout all pages of the app.

Web and Android Developer
